column3: Latest;Kompong Speu Province:------ A jealous woman took a knife and an ax
column4: cutting a man in the left of his neck
column5: causing sudden death on the evening of August 25
column11: the couple got into a heated argument
column12: and the woman pulled a large farming knife in one hand and an ax in the other and slashed her husband
column13: killing his instantly.------The suspect was arrested and taken to district police for questioning. ------In front of the police
column14: the suspect admitted she had stabbed the victim with a knife.------ The case was sent to the Kompong Speu Provincial Police for further proceedings. ------KBN
